compliant.section: We also collect other non-personal types of data, including device information such as the type of browser or operating system used and software usage statistics. We use this data, and may compile and analyze the data, in order to improve products and services and to personalize your experience with us.
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization: collecting only necessary data for the specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes.

compliant.section: Examples of non-personal data include hardware configuration, computer or device characteristics and connection information such as browser type, version and time zone setting, operating system, and platform; the full Uniform Resource Locator (URL) clickstream to, through and from our websites including date and time, cookie number.
compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation: processing data only for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes.

compliant.section: We use tracking technologies such as cookies (small files placed on your hard drive), web beacons, website analytics tools, and the personal information you provide us to personalize your online experience and improve our services.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing: obtaining consent for processing personal data for specific, explicit, and legitimate purposes.

compliant.section: Some information about your use of the CyberTAN Services may be collected using tracking technologies across time and services, and used by us and third parties for purposes, such as to associate different devices you use, and deliver relevant ads and/or other content to you on the CyberTAN Services.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and information to be provided when data is collected: informing users about the logic involved in automated decision-making, including profiling, and its significance and envisaged consequences.

compliant.section: Please see our Cookie Policy for additional information, including certain choices you may have regarding some of these activities.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the data subject's rights.

compliant.section: By accessing CyberTAN Services, you consent to the placement of cookies and our and third party use of track technologies subject to our Cookie Policy.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent: ensuring consent is freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous indication of the data subject's wishes.

compliant.section: We encourage you to look at opt-out methods described in our Cookie Policy or as otherwise available from applicable third parties.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to object: providing data subjects the right to object to processing of their personal data, including for direct marketing purposes.

non_compliant.section: We do not currently monitor or take action regarding these signals.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to object: taking into account and responding to "Do Not Track" signals as a means for users to exercise their right to object to tracking.
non_compliant.amend: Implement a mechanism to recognize and honor "Do Not Track" signals or provide a clear and accessible explanation for not doing so, along with alternative options for users to opt-out of tracking.

non_compliant.section: To transfer information to our authorized third parties; and
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information about third-party transfers: providing specific information about the transfer of personal data to third countries or international organizations, including the appropriate safeguards in place.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the categories of recipients of the personal data, including any third parties. If data is transferred outside the EEA, specify the legal basis for the transfer and the safeguards implemented to protect the data.

non_compliant.section: 10. Other uses as indicated with the information that is collected.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation: specifying the purposes of processing at the time of collection and ensuring any further processing is compatible with those purposes.
non_compliant.amend: Avoid vague and overly broad language like "other uses." Clearly define all purposes for data processing at the time of collection.
